thread.title: Arizona Coyotes to their fans: Stop doing the Wave
thread.title_full: Arizona Coyotes to their fans: Stop doing the Wave

author: Matt Bonesteel
title: Arizona Coyotes to their fans: Stop doing the Wave
text:
By Matt Bonesteel By Matt Bonesteel February 21 at 8:49 AM Follow @MattBonesteel Glass-slapping is okay. The Wave is not. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin) 
With just four postseason appearances over the past 15 seasons, 49 standings points this year (only the Colorado Avalanche are worse) and terrible attendance, the Arizona Coyotes arenâ€™t exactly one of the NHLâ€™s shining lights. So on those rare occasions when they do give their home fans something to cheer about â€” such as Monday nightâ€™s 3-2 upset of the Anaheim Ducks â€” their supporters go at it all wrong. Attention fans in 112: We don't do the wave here. 
The Coyotesâ€™ fans are not alone among their NHL brethren in trying to make the Wave a thing again. Apparently, itâ€™s also been spotted in Calgary. Trying to do the wave. Stop. #Flames 
â€” Leah Kessel ðŸ”¥ (@leahflame) November 17, 2016 if flames lose literally all the blame will be put on whoever started the wave
